traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The catoblepas has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a catoblepas that starts its turn within 10 feet of the catoblepas must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of any catoblepas for 1 hour.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (5d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the start of the catoblepas's next turn.

actions.name: Death Ray {@recharge 5}
entries: The catoblepas targets a creature that it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8 damage) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target instead takes 64 necrotic damage. The target dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this ray.
